description: photo of three men--one standing, one seated on a log or drum, one seated on ground--wearing tall rounded hats, skirted coats, and leggings with wraps; two men have waist-length hair in tight curls, one man has shoulder length hair; text in blue, white, and orange at top; blue typewritten text at bottom

title: Grateful Dead, Quicksilver Messenger Service, Johnny Hammond and his Screaming Nighthawks, Robert Baker, Avalon Ballroom, March 24-26, 1967
